CustomField.formula: IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Requires Follow-Up") , 1, IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Opportunity not Created") , 2, IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Opportunity not Linked") , 3, IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Future Follow-Up") , 4, IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Attempted to Contact - Awaiting Response") , 5, IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Accepted - Completed Follow-Up") , 6, IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Rejected - Completed Follow-Up") , 7, IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Routed to Channel") , 8, IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Inactive") , 9, IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Cancelled") , 10, IF( ISPICKVAL( Status__c , "Cancelled - Sales Inactivity") , 11, 100)))))))))))
CustomField.label: Status Importance
